## Code Example 1
This markdown text section introduces **multiplication** and **addition** operations in R

``` {R multiplication}
print(3*2)
```
``` {R addition}
print(3+2)
```

## Code Example 2
This markdown text section introduces **subtraction** and **division** operations in R

``` {R subtraction}
print(8-2)
```
``` {R division}
print(8/2)
```


## Code Example 3
This markdown text section introduces **square** and **modulo** operations in R

``` {R square}
print(8**2)
```
``` {R modulo}
print(8%%3)
```
